message.body: what's the deal? u went radio silent.
Come on...I need a workout partner!
hey. when are you available to talk during the day? lunch break? i'll have privacy then.
It varies day by day...IM me and if I'm free we'll chat.
cool. talk to you tomorrow then.
btw, did you know that asya messaged me?
she did? wow, what did she want? finally gonna scratch that itch?

it went like this:
AZ: has 4 years been long enough for you? AJC: ummm...long enough for what? AZ: that is entirely for you to decide. AJC: (silence)
nothing since. it's been a few days. weird, right?

very funny.
4 yrs ago was her asking if i wanted to be friends, i said yes, then she piled on the rules, and i said no.
i wished her a happy birthday after that, and she thanked me.
whatever. silence it is. no apologies from me. just thought it was str
